name: Pandora Dark Starlightning
description:
Darkens Pandora's background and various elements while preserving its overall look and feel. Includes their help and community pages. There are a few mods:
  • Song progress bar thicker
  • Dim cover art visible in background of "Now Playing"
  • Current song "eq" animation is more visible
additional_info: 2022-10-11 - Fix now playing history wrap buttons.
